quotes.text: I thought you elves were supposed to be smart.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: I thought you dwarfs were supposed to be short.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: I do a backflip and land on my feet.
quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.context: Nat 20 athletics after being thrown from the wagon

quotes.text: What a show.
quotes.speaker: Ekran

quotes.text: I won't do what you tell me!
quotes.speaker: GM (Alex)
quotes.context: Setting the Rage Against the Machine tone from the start

quotes.text: Stupid floor.
quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.context: His only thought after the rat battle

quotes.text: Am I the only one hanging on by a thread here?
quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.context: Realizing she almost died to rats

quotes.text: Bored him to death.
quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.context: After Ekran was knocked out by Borby

quotes.text: This is no time to be cooking.
quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.context: Watching Periwinkle attack the dead boar

quotes.text: Think these things carry rabies?
quotes.speaker: Ekran

quotes.text: I'm gonna be squishy but I can do cool looking things.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: Badass. Sleep Now with the Fire Wolf.
quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.context: Naming the Rage Against the Machine song for Kaelia's fire wolf

quotes.text: I stare him down.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: It's not always about killing stuff.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: How long have you been playing that? I guess just a few minutes.
quotes.speaker: Ekran
quotes.context: After his nat 20 pan flute performance

quotes.text: This soundtrack sounds like straight up Star Trek.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: Quite refreshing, the water's fine.
quotes.speaker: Ekran
quotes.context: After falling face-first into the stream

quotes.text: Sounds like he met his end.
quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.context: After Ekran shot a goblin in the rear

quotes.text: My arrow certainly did.
quotes.speaker: Ekran

quotes.text: But it's fire and water.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: Anything to make everyone forget about the foot thing.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: We should do Bulls on Parade with old school medieval instruments.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: This wolf had it out for Klarg. Klarg must have tortured this wolf pretty hard.
quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.context: As the wolf delivers the killing blow

quotes.text: Retribution is the boy's name. That boy's name is Retribution.
quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.context: First naming the wolf (later became Larry)

quotes.text: That was a straight Han Solo and Chewie running right into the wall of Stormtroopers.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Well, Semaj is able to live again. But, man, MVP ain't dog, ain't my buddy.
quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.context: End of session - the wolf was the real hero

quotes.text: I can keep you barely alive.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: You made wolf paste.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: That was a brutal duel. It was an upset victory—without the victory. It was just upset.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: That was so dramatic, clownish, and anti-climactic all at the same time.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: STOP! Fight me one-on-one!
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: As a rogue, I'm not gonna honor any—now you lost a duel, like, I'mma shoot him in the face.
quotes.speaker: Ekran

quotes.text: One of these other wolves I'll name him Gary. Gary and Ace.
quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.context: Trying to name the other wolves

quotes.text: Belden, you got like Wil Wheaton level luck with those ones, man.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: COWARDS!
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: If the Black Spider unlocks this cave before we do, gods help us all.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Ruxithid is not a goblin. It's something older. Something patient. Something that waits.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Larry looks to Samaj with viscera and gore around his mouth like: Did I do a good job?
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: Frickin' Larry the GOAT.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I should have, as the life was fading from his eyes, been like: Coward! COWARD!
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: Your hammer hits harder than you think. And your heart's even stronger. Don't forget that.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Firelight doesn't just burn—it guides.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: To Ekran!
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: Joseph, you idiot.
quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.context: Redbrands watching their friend trip down stairs

quotes.text: The last time this happened, I heard someone was eating dwarves and I failed my rage save. This time, I'm just drunk.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: Let's gut these heroes and use their skulls for mugs!
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: The drunken master for the win—he was dodging every dude and killing everybody.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I went into a big battle, killed a couple guys, and then went down in a blaze of glory. Woke up to dead bodies.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: His brain just fizzles out and explodes and falls down.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: He lunges into the air, catches the Redbrand by the throat. And he just starts ripping.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I was dealing with the personal turmoil of losing a duel with a goblin.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: Hammer smash face! It's a Cannibal Corpse song.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I don't see a hippo.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: Either I'm dead or I'm still drunk. What is going on?
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: You taste different. Magic in your blood. Pain in your past.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Grista mutters: I'm going to need to kill another pig.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Let's remind these Redbrands what happens when good people stop standing alone.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: It's the ghost of hippo past!
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: And by the time the flames finish, and you can see again in front of you, there is nothing. Absolutely nothing.
quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.context: Belden's Dragon's Breath vaporizing an enemy

quotes.text: Today, you meet water.
quotes.speaker: Aster

quotes.text: I'm just very unusually happy with the amount of fire going on in the general vicinity.
quotes.speaker: Kaelia

quotes.text: You cannot steal this from Shiva!
quotes.speaker: Aster
quotes.context: Complaining about Kaelia taking his kills

quotes.text: Both of these bugbears are now nearly disintegrated.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: This was an entire session of combat. We didn't leave a room.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I didn't use my hammer once at all. I fought the whole thing with traveler's clothes.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: The wet traveler's clothes is the last thing he sees.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: The traveler's clothes whip—chef's kiss.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: This is the session I've decided that if there's a trap, I must test to see how well the trap is made.
quotes.speaker: Belden

quotes.text: I grab him by the throat, strangle him in one hand, and toss his dead body back in the cistern.
quotes.speaker: Valrex

quotes.text: Shrapnel damage!
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: He doesn't even scream. The fire just robs him of his breath before it robs him of his life.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: He's double dead.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: When you started using teleport, I said NO.
quotes.speaker: Valrex

quotes.text: This Phoenix Sorcerer is absolutely badass.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: He was supposed to protect Phandalin. Instead he terrorized it.
quotes.speaker: Semaj

quotes.text: That was a well-earned kill. We went through 20 rounds.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Those are the ones that killed the Redbrands.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: Bugbears hurt Droop. Droop was just stuck.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: We killed him by the skin of his teeth.
quotes.speaker: Valrex

quotes.text: That removes the knife at Phandalin's throat.
quotes.speaker: GM

quotes.text: I rolled a natural one. I've never seen that before in my life.
quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.context: Failing to recognize the Lion Shield symbol
